meanings.definition: Not done or acting according to a fixed plan or system.
meanings.sent1: Her approach to organizing her room was very unsystematic.
meanings.sent2: The unsystematic arrangement of the books made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent3: He tried to follow a map in an unsystematic way, ending up lost in the park.
meanings.sent4: The unsystematic growth of the plants in the garden created a wild and untamed look.
meanings.sent5: The unsystematic jumble of colors in the painting gave it a chaotic feel.

meanings.definition: Lacking a systematic method or organization.
meanings.sent1: The unsystematic filing system caused confusion among the employees.
meanings.sent2: Her unsystematic approach to studying led to poor grades.
meanings.sent3: The unsystematic arrangement of chairs in the classroom made it look like a maze.
meanings.sent4: The unsystematic flow of traffic during rush hour caused major delays.
meanings.sent5: The unsystematic layout of the store made it difficult to navigate.
